sentences.english: The occurrence and damage of the forestry pests in Huangpu district were intro- duced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了黃埔區林業有害生物的發生和危害情況。

sentences.english: I have been living in Huangpu, Guangzhou for two years. I like here very much.
sentences.chinese: 我已經在廣州市黃埔區居住兩年了，我很喜歡這裏。
